features.featureTitle: Update the GallerySection component (frontend/src/components/GallerySection.tsx) to replace the existing four Admin Meet gallery images with the four newly uploaded photos from the September 21, 2025 Admin Meet event. Save the new images as static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/ with filenames: gallery-admin-meet-1.png, gallery-admin-meet-2.png, gallery-admin-meet-3.png, gallery-admin-meet-4.png. Display them in a responsive image grid inside an event card with the title 'एडमिन पैनल मीटिंग – 21 सितंबर 2025' and subtitle 'मुंबरा (ठाणे), महाराष्ट्र, भारत'. Retain the existing section heading 'गैलेरी' and decorative gold divider. Style consistently with the existing maroon/gold palette and card-based layout.
